<html>
  <style>
    div.mw-body-content > p:last-child > br {
      display: none;
    }

    .display-ds {
      display: block;
    }

    .display-mb {
      display: none;
    }

    @font-face {
      font-family: 'Linux Libertine';
      src: url('/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/LinLibertine_R.woff') format('woff');
      font-weight: 400;
      font-style: normal;
      font-display: swap;
    }

    @font-face {
      font-family: 'Montserrat Bold';
      src: url('/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/Montserrat-bold-webfont.woff2') format('woff2');
      font-weight: 700;
      font-style: normal;
      font-display: swap;
    }

    :root {
      --font-serif: "Source Serif 4", Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
      --font-serif-wp25: "Linux Libertine", "Source Serif 4", Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
      --font-h3-wp25: "Montserrat Bold", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Lato,
      Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
      --font-sans: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Lato,
      Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    }

    div.mw-body-content {
      background: #d5e9fd;
      background-image: url("/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/Wp25-letter-puzzle-lightblue.png");
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: right -15px top 28px;
      background-size: calc(0.25 * 100vw);
      display: flex;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 60px 0;
      background-position-x: 0%;
      background-position-y: 0%;
    }

    header.wp25-header {
      display: none;
    }

    div.mw-body-content > header.wp25-header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      padding: 24px 40px;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #BFBFBF;
      background: white;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      flex: 0 0 100%;
    }

    div#main-wrapper {
      max-width: 1220px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      align-items: flex-start;
    }

    #wp25 {
      max-width: 720px;
      padding: unset;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 24px;
    }

    #wp25 h2, #wp25 p {
      margin: 0;
    }

    #wp25 h2 {
      font-family: var(--font-serif-wp25);
      font-size: 40px;
      line-height: 125%;
      border: none;
    }

    #wp25 .hero-image {
      max-width: 640px;
      width: 100%;
      height: auto;
    }

    #wp25 div.copy {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 8px;
    }

    #wp25 p {
      font-family: var(--font-sans);
      line-height: 150%;
    }

    #wp25.paragraph {
      font-size: 18px;
    }

    #wp25 p.footer {
      font-size: 14px;
    }

    #wp25 p.attribution {
      font-size: 13px;
    }

    #wp25 div.text-box {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: row;
      gap: 12px;
      padding: 24px;
      border: 1px solid #BB5C26;
      border-radius: 4px;
    }

    #wp25 div.text-box svg.logo {
      flex-shrink: 0;
      width: 37px;
      height: 37px;
    }

    div.wp25-box {
      position: relative;
      background-image: url("/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/Wp25-bg-puzzle-middle.png");
      background-repeat: repeat-y;
      background-position: center 13px;
      background-clip: content-box;
      background-size: contain;
      padding-top: 13px;
      padding-bottom: 13px;
      margin-top: 40px;
    }

    div.wp25-box::before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      top: 0;
      height: 13px;
      background: url("/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/Wp25-bg-puzzle-top.png") no-repeat center top;
      background-size: cover;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    div.wp25-box::after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      height: 13px;
      background: url("/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/Wp25-bg-puzzle-bottom.png") no-repeat center bottom;
      background-size: cover;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    div.wp25-box div.wp25-box__inner {
      padding: 0 16px;
    }

    div.wp25-box div.wp25-box__inner #form-wrapper {
      border: none;
      padding-top: 0;
      margin-top: 30px;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper #donate-footer {
      max-width: 1220px;
      color: #202122;
      font-size: 14px;
      padding: 0 40px;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper {
      background: white;
      padding: 40px 0;
      margin-top: 40px;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper #donate-footer #donate-tax-message div {
      text-align: left !important;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper #donate-footer #donate-tax-message div a {
      font-size: 16px;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper a {
      text-decoration: underline;
      color: #202122 !important;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper #donate-links-block ul {
      display: flex;
      gap: 24px;
    }

    div.footer-wrapper #donate-links-block ul li a {
      padding: 0 !important;
      font-size: 16px;
    }

    body {
      background: #d5e9fd;
    }

    #appeal,
    #donate {
      flex: 1 0 50%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    #appeal {
      flex: 1 0 50%;
      max-width: 640px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      font-size: 16px;
      margin-right: 40px;
      padding: unset;
      padding-left: 24px;
    }

    #donate {
      flex: 1 0 50%;
      max-width: 412px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      margin-left: 40px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      gap: 15px;
    }

    body div#content {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
    }

    .vector-body p {
      margin: 0;
    }

    #infobox-wrapper p {
      margin: 0.5em 0;
    }

    @media screen {
      body div#mw-page-base.noprint {
        height: 3em;
      }
    }

    @media screen {
      body div#mw-page-base.noprint {
        height: 3em;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1069px) {
      .display-ds {
        display: none;
      }

      .display-mb {
        display: block;
      }

      div.mw-body-content {
        background-position: right -30px top 70px;
        background-size: 140px;
        gap: unset;
      }

      div.mw-body-content #main-wrapper {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 10px;
      }

      div.mw-body-content #appeal-wrapper {
        display: block !important;
      }

      div.mw-body-content > header.wp25-header {
        padding: 16px 20px;
      }

      div.mw-body-content > header.wp25-header > svg.wmf-logo {
        height: 32px;
        width: auto;
      }

      #wp25.display-ds {
        display: none;
      }

      #wp25-mb.display-mb {
        display: block;
      }

      #wp25-mb {
        max-width: 412px;
        padding: 16px 20px;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 8px;
      }

      #wp25-mb h2, #wp25-mb p {
        margin: 0;
      }

      #wp25-mb h2 {
        font-family: var(--font-serif-wp25);
        font-size: 28px;
        line-height: 125%;
        border: none;
      }

      #wp25-mb h3 {
        font-family: var(--font-h3-wp25);
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 150%;
      }

      div.wp25-box {
        margin-top: 0;
      }

      div.footer-wrapper {
        padding: 0;
        margin-top: 0;
      }

      div.footer-wrapper #donate-footer {
        font-size: 12px;
        padding: 24px 20px;
      }

      div.footer-wrapper #donate-footer > div:last-child {
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

      div.footer-wrapper #donate-links-block ul {
        flex-direction: column;
        text-align: left;
        gap: 8px;
      }

      div.footer-wrapper #donate-links-block ul li a {
        font-size: 14px;
      }

      #appeal {
        flex: unset;
        max-width: unset;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        font-size: 16px;
        margin-right: 0;
        padding: unset;
      }

      body div#mw-navigation {
        display: none;
      }

      #wp25-mb h2, #wp25-mb p {
        margin: 0;
      }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 1069px) {
      div.mw-body-content{
        background: white;
      }

      body #donate {
        padding: 16px 20px;
      }

      #mw-content-text div[style="line-height: 1px;"] {
        display:none;
      }
    }

  </style>

	<script>
    window.onload = function () {
    	const logoAnchor = document.querySelector('#p-logo a');
    	if (logoAnchor) {
          const logoDiv = document.createElement('div');
          logoDiv.setAttribute("class","mw-wiki-logo")
          logoAnchor.parentNode.replaceChild(logoDiv, logoAnchor);
    	}

        // Clone wp25-header and move as first child of mw-body-content. Easier than writing markup in JS.
        const header = document.querySelector('header.wp25-header');
        const parserOutput = document.querySelector('div.mw-body-content');

        if (header) {
          if (parserOutput) {
            const clone = header.cloneNode(true);
            parserOutput.insertBefore(clone, parserOutput.firstChild);
            header.remove(); // Delete original
          }
        }

        // Puzzle background on form
        const formWrapper = document.getElementById('form-wrapper');
        if (formWrapper) {
          const wp25Box = document.createElement('div');
          wp25Box.className = 'wp25-box';

          const wp25BoxInner = document.createElement('div');
          wp25BoxInner.className = 'wp25-box__inner';

          formWrapper.parentNode.insertBefore(wp25Box, formWrapper);
          wp25Box.appendChild(wp25BoxInner);
          wp25BoxInner.appendChild(formWrapper);
        }

        // Footer styling
        const footer = document.getElementById('donate-footer');
        if (footer) {
          const footerWrapper = document.createElement('div');
          footerWrapper.className = 'footer-wrapper';

          footer.parentNode.insertBefore(footerWrapper, footer);
          footerWrapper.appendChild(footer);
        }
    };
	</script>

  <section id="wp25" class="display-ds">
    <h2>Le meilleur de la connaissance<br />depuis 25 ans</h2>

    <img class="hero-image" src="/extensions/DonationInterface/resources/appeal/wp25/W25-landing-page-main-image.png" alt="Image de l'astronaute Samantha Cristoforetti à bord de l'ISS" width="640" height="327" />

    <div class="copy">
      <p class="paragraph">Vingt-cinq ans après sa création, Wikipédia est toujours là. Née d’un rêve si ambitieux qu’il paraissait impossible, elle représente aujourd’hui une ressource essentielle pour l’humanité, parce qu’elle est financée par des lecteurs et lectrices comme vous et qu’elle est riche des connaissances partagées par des bénévoles du monde entier.</p>
      <p class="paragraph"><strong>À vous de protéger l’avenir du savoir.</strong></p>
      <p class="paragraph">La plupart des lecteurs et lectrices font des dons parce que Wikipédia leur est utile ; pour d’autres, c’est parce qu’elles et ils croient en la valeur du savoir créé par des êtres humains.</p>
      <p class="paragraph">Nous ignorons à quoi ressemblera le monde dans 25 ans, mais nous voulons que Wikipédia en fasse encore partie. Si vous êtes aussi de cet avis, merci de donner dès maintenant, afin de faire vivre le dernier grand rêve d’Internet. Merci.</p>
    </div>

    <div class="text-box">
      <svg class="logo" width="37" height="37" viewBox="0 0 37 37" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="img" aria-label="Logo de la Fondation Wikimedia">

      </svg>
      <p class="paragraph">La Wikimedia Foundation est l’organisation à but non lucratif qui héberge Wikipédia ; elle soutient les personnes et les technologies qui rendent possible le partage d’informations fiables avec le monde.</p>
    </div>

    <div class="copy">

    </div>
  </section>


  <section id="wp25-mb" class="display-mb">
    <h2 class="display-mb">Soutenez 25 ans de Wikipédia aujourd’hui</h2>
    <h3 class="paragraph">Aidez-nous à faire vivre le dernier grand rêve d’Internet pour qu’en profitent les générations futures.</h3>
  </section>
